pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiscale Climate Model Assessment // Provides functions allowing for (1) easy aggregation of multivariate time series into custom time scales, (2) comparison of statistical summaries between different data sets at multiple time scales (e.g. observed and bias-corrected data), (3) comparison of relations between variables and/or different data sets at multiple time scales (e.g. correlation of precipitation and temperature in control and scenario simulation) and (4) transformation of time series at custom time scales.
